HomeFAQs.question: How many members are allowed in a team ?
HomeFAQs.answer: Every event has different rules for team formation. You can refer to the rulebook present under every event on the website.

HomeFAQs.question: Can I participate individually in any event ?
HomeFAQs.answer: There are some events in which individual participation is allowed. You can refer to the rulebook present under every event on the website.

HomeFAQs.question: How can I attend the workshops?
HomeFAQs.answer: You have to register for the workshops and pay the desirable fees.

HomeFAQs.question: Can I attend any event more than once?
HomeFAQs.answer: You can only attend the upshot events more than once.

PassFAQs.question: What are the fees for the events?
PassFAQs.answer: There are no individual registration fees for the events.If you wish to participate in an event you have to purchase a pass. This pass excludes DJ night and workshops.

PassFAQs.question: Will I get a refund?
PassFAQs.answer: The pass fees are non-refundable and non-transferable in any case
